Activity: Wake up, prepare for the last working day of the week.
Log in to the system, check emails, and address any remaining tasks.
Review all data cleaning procedures and scripts developed this week. Ensure they are well-documented and organized.
Create a summary report of the data sources researched and the data cleaning procedures implemented. Highlight any challenges or limitations.
Write an email to @pm-1 to provide an update on the progress made this week. Share the summary report and any relevant findings. TOPIC: Week 2 Progress Report: Data Source Research and Data Cleaning.
Lunch break, enjoy a more relaxed meal.
Start thinking about potential statistical arbitrage strategies based on the available data. Brainstorm ideas and research existing strategies.
Document the potential arbitrage strategies and their data requirements. Identify any missing data or limitations.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the potential arbitrage strategies and the data cleaning procedures. Present to @qres-1, @qres-2, @qres-3.
Discuss the presentation with the quantitative research team. Gather feedback and refine the strategies.
